CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {below} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VE.Q: What is Ironwood Market's Home Sales in 2002?
VE.A: Ironwood Market's home sales in 2002 is {621.54} units/month.

VE.Q: What is Ironwood Market's Home Sales in 2020?
VE.A: Ironwood Market's home sales in 2020 is {93.89} units/month.

VE.Q: What is Echo Trade's Home Sales in 1999?
VE.A: Echo Trade's home sales in 1999 is {854.72} units/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Home Sales in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum home sales is {10.00} units/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Home Sales in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum home sales is {984.15} units/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Home Sales level recorded for Echo Trade?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade reached approximately {974.62} units/month in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Home Sales level recorded for Echo Trade?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's lowest recorded level is approximately {10.00} units/month in {2015}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Home Sales?
SC.A: The average total home sales is {664.36} units/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Home Sales go below 170.20 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {74.40} units/month in {2024}, {71.58} units/month in {2021}, {69.30} units/month in {2019}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Home Sales exceed 913.67 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {1682.87} units/month in {1999}, {1146.41} units/month in {2003}, {1330.50} units/month in {2002}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Home Sales fall between 514.84 and 569.03 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2015, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 2007 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1999 and 2015 was {higher} than between 2007 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2002, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 2013 and 2017?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1998 and 2002 was {higher} than between 2013 and 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2018, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 2013 and 2022?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between 2006 and 2018 was {larger} than between 2013 and 2022.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 2002 higher or lower than in 2015?
NC.A: The total home sales in 2002 was {higher} than in 2015.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Market} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Echo Trade, Ironwood Market}.
